verses.verse: "Let not your heart <WG2588> be troubled; <WG5015> believe <WG4100> in God, <WG2316> believe <WG4100> also <WG2532> in Me.

"In My Father's house <WG3614> are many <WG4183> dwelling <WG3438> places; <WG3438> if <WG1487> it were not so, I would have told <WG3004> you; for I go <WG4198> to prepare <WG2090> a place <WG5117> for you.

"And if <WG1437> I go <WG4198> and prepare <WG2090> a place <WG5117> for you, I will come <WG2064> again, <WG3825> and receive <WG3880> you to Myself; <WG1683> that where <WG3699> I am, <WG1510> [there] you may be also. <WG2532>
"And you know <WG3609> the way <WG3598> where <WG3699> I am going. <WG5217>"
Thomas <WG2381> said <WG3004> to Him, "Lord, <WG2962> we do not know <WG3609> where <WG4226> You are going, <WG5217> how <WG4459> do we know <WG3609> the way <WG3598>?"

Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to him, "I am <WG1510> the way, <WG3598> and the truth, <WG225> and the life; <WG2222> no <WG3762> one <WG3762> comes <WG2064> to the Father, <WG3962> but through <WG1223> Me.
"If <WG1487> you had known <WG1097> Me, you would have known <WG3609> My Father <WG3962> also; <WG2532> from now <WG737> on you know <WG1097> Him, and have seen <WG3708> Him."
Philip <WG5376> said <WG3004> to Him, "Lord, <WG2962> show <WG1166> us the Father, <WG3962> and it is enough <WG714> for us."

Jesus <WG2424> said <WG3004> to him, "Have I been <WG1510> so <WG5118> long <WG5118> <WG5550> with you, and [yet] you have not come to know <WG1097> Me, Philip <WG5376>? He who has seen <WG3708> Me has seen <WG3708> the Father; <WG3962> how <WG4459> do you say, <WG3004> 'Show <WG1166> us the Father <WG3962>'?

"Do you not believe <WG4100> that I am in the Father, <WG3962> and the Father <WG3962> is in Me? The words <WG4487> that I say <WG3004> to you I do not speak <WG2980> on My own <WG1683> initiative, <WG1683> but the Father <WG3962> abiding <WG3306> in Me does <WG4160> His works. <WG2041>
"Believe <WG4100> Me that I am in the Father, <WG3962> and the Father <WG3962> in Me; otherwise <WG7507> believe <WG4100> on account <WG1223> of the works <WG2041> themselves. <WG846>

"Truly, <WG281> truly, <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, he who believes <WG4100> in Me, the works <WG2041> that I do <WG4160> shall he do <WG4160> also; <WG2548> and greater <WG3173> [works] than these <WG3778> shall he do; <WG4160> because <WG3754> I go <WG4198> to the Father. <WG3962>
"And whatever <WG3739> <WG5100> <WG302> you ask <WG154> in My name, <WG3686> that will I do, <WG4160> that the Father <WG3962> may be glorified <WG1392> in the Son. <WG5207>
"If <WG1437> you ask <WG154> Me anything <WG5100> in My name, <WG3686> I will do <WG4160> [it.]
"If <WG1437> you love <WG25> Me, you will keep <WG5083> My commandments. <WG1785>
"And I will ask <WG2065> the Father, <WG3962> and He will give <WG1325> you another <WG243> Helper, <WG3875> that He may be with you forever; <WG165>

[that is] the Spirit <WG4151> of truth, <WG225> whom <WG3739> the world <WG2889> cannot <WG1410> <WG3756> receive, <WG2983> because <WG3754> it does not behold <WG2334> Him or <WG3761> know <WG1097> Him, [but] you know <WG1097> Him because <WG3754> He abides <WG3306> with you, and will be in you.
"I will not leave <WG863> you as orphans; <WG3737> I will come <WG2064> to you.

"After <WG2089> a little <WG3398> while <WG3398> the world <WG2889> will behold <WG2334> Me no <WG3765> more; <WG3765> but you [will] behold <WG2334> Me; because <WG3754> I live, <WG2198> you shall live <WG2198> also. <WG2532>
"In that day <WG2250> you shall know <WG1097> that I am in My Father, <WG3962> and you in Me, and I in you.

"He who has <WG2192> My commandments <WG1785> and keeps <WG5083> them, he it is who loves <WG25> Me; and he who loves <WG25> Me shall be loved <WG25> by My Father, <WG3962> and I will love <WG25> him, and will disclose <WG1718> Myself <WG1683> to him."

Judas <WG2455> (not Iscariot <WG2469>) said <WG3004> to Him, "Lord, <WG2962> what <WG5101> then <WG2532> has happened <WG1096> that You are going <WG3195> to disclose <WG1718> Yourself <WG4572> to us, and not to the world <WG2889>?"

Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and said <WG3004> to him, "If <WG1437> anyone <WG5100> loves <WG25> Me, he will keep <WG5083> My word; <WG3056> and My Father <WG3962> will love <WG25> him, and We will come <WG2064> to him, and make <WG4160> Our abode <WG3438> with him.
"He who does not love <WG25> Me does not keep <WG5083> My words; <WG3056> and the word <WG3056> which <WG3739> you hear <WG191> is not Mine, <WG1699> but the Father's who sent <WG3992> Me.
"These <WG3778> things <WG3778> I have spoken <WG2980> to you, while abiding <WG3306> with you.

"But the Helper, <WG3875> the Holy <WG40> Spirit, <WG4151> whom <WG3739> the Father <WG3962> will send <WG3992> in My name, <WG3686> He will teach <WG1321> you all <WG3956> things, <WG3956> and bring <WG5279> to your remembrance <WG5279> all <WG3956> that I said <WG3004> to you.

"Peace <WG1515> I leave <WG863> with you; My peace <WG1515> I give <WG1325> to you; not as the world <WG2889> gives, <WG1325> do I give <WG1325> to you. Let not your heart <WG2588> be troubled, <WG5015> nor <WG3366> let it be fearful. <WG1168>

"You heard <WG191> that I said <WG3004> to you, 'I go <WG5217> away, <WG5217> and I will come <WG2064> to you.' If <WG1487> you loved <WG25> Me, you would have rejoiced, <WG5463> because <WG3754> I go <WG4198> to the Father; <WG3962> for the Father <WG3962> is greater <WG3173> than I.
"And now <WG3568> I have told <WG3004> you before <WG4250> it comes <WG1096> to pass, <WG1096> that when <WG3752> it comes <WG1096> to pass, <WG1096> you may believe. <WG4100>
"I will not speak <WG2980> much <WG4183> more <WG3765> with you, for the ruler <WG758> of the world <WG2889> is coming, <WG2064> and he has <WG2192> nothing <WG3756> <WG3762> in Me;

but that the world <WG2889> may know <WG1097> that I love <WG25> the Father, <WG3962> and as the Father <WG3962> gave <WG1781> Me commandment, <WG1781> even so <WG3779> I do. <WG4160> Arise, <WG1453> let us go <WG71> from here. <WG1782>
